column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is really nice
column2: and our waitress was so kind and funny. I got the bullseye French toast and I was really underwhelmed. I expected it to be heavy
column3: which it was. Somehow the flavors didn't marry well together... it just wasn't good. It wasn't photogenic
column4: either. The one thing it was... is soggy. I'd probably go here again but try something else... my boyfriend got the corned beef hash. He liked it! It looked good
